channel.title: Comments on: Aaron asks, “How can I connect my laptop to my TV?”
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: BestMonitors
item.dc:creator: BestMonitors
item.description: It seems like now-a-days technology has advanced quick enough that you can just buy a monitor sufficient enough to be both your t.v and desktop. Especially with the power of Netflix and these other companies that make it so you can watch so many things online instead of needing Cable or or satellite.
item.content:encoded: It seems like now-a-days technology has advanced quick enough that you can just buy a monitor sufficient enough to be both your t.v and desktop. Especially with the power of Netflix and these other companies that make it so you can watch so many things online instead of needing Cable or or satellite.
